Title: Establishes a support team assisted response pilot program
Summary: Establishes a support team assisted response pilot program in any city with a population of one million or more for the purpose of providing emergency response services for mental health, substance use and other non-criminal public health emergencies.
LawCode: Add ยง7.49, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a support team assisted response pilot program
